page.title: 18TELEVISION PROGRAMMES 1985
page.content: On television you can have four channels there are BBC1 BBC2 TVS and Channel 4.There is a television page which is called TELETEXT.You can watch jokes and you could be asked questions. The time will show upon the screen with a alarm.If you type in the right numbers you can see the television page and it has a built in alarm.The television is very handy at times because if there is a terrible crash it will most probably give you a report.All televisions are bought with an ON and OFF switch a BRIGHTNESS switch a VOLUME switch and on some televisions you have a place to plug the computer into.Also you must have an ariel which faces N.E.in Nomansland.A television also must have Electricity.
